job_description:
Role: Senior .NET Developer-Core

Location: Canada/Remote

Duration: 6 Months

Need Some senior profiles .Net Core.

Responsibilities

Adhere to defined development processes under the guidance of senior development staff

Programs and/or analyses taking into account current standards;

Becomes familiar with the existing program code;

Checks the results to ensure that the programs are working properly.

Work with Quality Assurance to ensure quality in all products being delivered

Ensure effective work habits including punctuality, responsiveness and accessibility to others

Observe the corporate values of Lifeworks

Qualifications

Good organizational abilities, oral/written communications and interpersonal skills

Knowledge with .NET platform (2+ years) and the Visual Studio IDE, .NET Core preferred

Knowledge with Javascript (2+ years) and related frameworks / libraries

Knowledge in Objected Oriented programming in C# programming (2+ years)

Knowledge with SQL programming and building database enabled applications using SQL server database platform (2+ years)

Understanding of n-tier architecture and web application architecture

Demonstrated ability to deliver high quality, easily maintainable code in a production software environment

Strong written and verbal communication skills
